main event: A civilian reported a sighting of an unidentified object described as reddish orange in color on July 22, 1955.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 2 minutes,The object was observed under foggy and overcast weather conditions with 4-mile visibility,No particular shape was noted for the object,The observer was Mrs. Harriet Burr, a reliable housewife and supervisor of GOC in Old Town, Maine,Insufficient data was provided for complete evaluation of the sighting.
witness description: Mrs. Harriet Burr, a reliable housewife and supervisor of GOC
